name: Death Drop (itch) (Pwnzer21)
description:
You move with WASD or arrow keys, that means you can also move up and down. You need to avoid spikes to get a high score.

I tried making this game for the Giga TriJam with the theme of death and reincarnation. Since there is only one game instead of two I sort of ummm... failed. Regardless, I did create one good game instead of two ok games and that has to be worth something.

There was going to be more content but I ran out of time which is funny considering this was only one game, I need to manage my development time better.

Hours: 7
